name: Game Dev for Early Childhood
description:
This game for developers and has two parts: a demo level of a game for preschoolers and then a mini-lecture in which I elucidate my philosophy of game dev for early childhood.

To play the game: Use the arrow keys. 

To watch the lecture: It plays automatically when you beat the game.

Note: The game launches in fullscreen and can only be closed by holding Ctrl, navigating to the exit button, and then entering the password "adult". As I explain in the mini-lecture, this is child safety lock that keeps preschool players in the game.
